Text.val: 21.04.2006 SH SCR10645 Fixed SQL bug for DULD_PRINTINVOICES=6, was
implemented without any remarks of developer
10.05.2004 JJ SCR6199 Part B: DEBC_DEBHBUYGROUP > 0 => po.AmountH = 0
28.04.2004 SH SCR 6101 Part C: Extended selection of INVO rows (SQL_SumDunning)
03.12.2002 JJ incuded addition al selection for DULD_PRINTINVOICES = 4
Where clause dynamically extended based on DULD_ PRINTINVOICES
C (else) Select invoices on dunning letter

SQL_STMT_U.val: select cast (sum(invo_aactualh) as decimal (13,2)) from :1/invo where invo_debc_no = :2 and invo_aactuali <> 0

select cast (sum(invo_aactualh) as decimal (13,2)) from :1/invo exception join :1/mark a on invo_markcodespec = a.mark_code and a.mark_verificationprintinv = 'N' exception join :1/mark b on invo_markcodetext = b.mark_code and b.mark_verificationprintinv = 'N' where invo_debc_no = :2 and invo_aactuali <>0 :3

select cast (sum(invo_aactualh) as decimal (13,2)) from :1/invo exception join :1/mark a on invo_markcodespec = a.mark_code and a.mark_dunningprintinv = 'N' exception join :1/mark b on invo_markcodetext = b.mark_code and b.mark_dunningprintinv = 'N' where invo_debc_no = :2 and invo_dunningstop = 'N' and (invo_aactuali < 0 or invo_aactuali > 0 :3)

select cast (sum(invo_aactualh) as decimal (13,2)) from :1/invo exception join :1/mark a on invo_markcodespec = a.mark_code and a.mark_dunningprintinv = 'N' exception join :1/mark b on invo_markcodetext = b.mark_code and b.mark_dunningprintinv = 'N' where invo_debc_no = :2 and invo_dunningstop = 'N' and invo_aactuali <> 0 :3
